name: microsoft-windows
author: Fulcrum Technology Solutions
description: A comprehensive bundle of templates for Microsoft Windows event logs across security, system, application, PowerShell, and Sysmon sources.

templates.name: Kerberos Authentication Ticket Request
templates.description: Windows Security Auditing event for Kerberos Authentication Ticket Request (Event ID 4768)

templates.name: Kerberos Authentication Failed
templates.description: Windows Security Auditing event for Kerberos Authentication Service Ticket Failed (Event ID 4771)

templates.name: Privilege Use
templates.description: Windows Security events for privilege use

templates.name: Process Creation
templates.description: Windows Security events for process creation (EventID 4688)

templates.name: Clop Ransomware Known Service Name
templates.description: Windows System event log for Clop ransomware known service names

templates.name: Service Start
templates.description: Windows System event log for service start events

templates.name: Service Stop
templates.description: Windows System event log for service stop events

templates.name: Time Change
templates.description: Windows System event log for system time change events

templates.name: Application Crash
templates.description: Windows Application event log for application crashes

templates.name: Application Error
templates.description: Windows Application event log for application errors

templates.name: Application Info
templates.description: Windows Application event log for informational events

templates.name: Application Warning
templates.description: Windows Application event log for application warnings

templates.name: ShadowCopy Script Block Logging
templates.description: PowerShell script block logging for ShadowCopy operations

templates.name: Process Creation AdFind
templates.description: Sysmon process creation events for AdFind tool
